title: Organizer: About Indian Institute of Technology Bhilai
description: Established in 2016, the Indian Institute of Technology Bhilai (IIT Bhilai) is one of the newer institutions in the prestigious IIT system, strategically located in Chhattisgarh. The institute was founded to improve excellence in engineering education, research, and technological innovation. Situated near the industrial city of Bhilai, the campus offers a unique advantage by providing students with close proximity to various industries, facilitating practical learning and industry exposure. IIT Bhilai is committed to providing a vibrant campus life, encouraging students to participate in a wide range of extracurricular activities, including sports, cultural events, and technical clubs, thus promoting holistic development alongside rigorous academic pursuits.

title: Organizer: About Villa College, Maldives
description: Villa College is the first private higher education institution of the Maldives. In 2007, it was founded by Hon. Dr. Qasim Ibrahim, Chairman of the Villa group, through the Private-Public Partnership Agreement with the government. In 2015, a new partnership with the University of the West of England (UWE) was established, which has proved to be the most fruitful partnership for the College. Since then, the College has signed to collaborate with numerous universities, the most recent most significant one being the agreement signed with Taylor’s University, which will introduce Culinary Arts as a new field of studies offered by Villa College. In the last few years, the variety of programs Villa College offers has expanded immensely, offering programs from high-demand areas such as Master’s in Counselling, and also offering programs from niche areas such as Art and Design.

title: Organizer: About St. Mother Theresa Engineering College
description: St. Mother Theresa Engineering College, popularly known as SMTEC, was established in the year 2009 with the vision to empower budding engineers in technical and entrepreneurial training and to contribute to the socio-economic augmentation of the nation. The campus is self-sustained with all the modern facilities required for quality Engineering Education, Upgraded Laboratories, Smart Classroom, Excellent Library Facility. The college offers a plethora of options for students to develop their talents, and it methodically turns graduates into professionals who are prepared for the future. The organization fosters an environment that is open to the sharing of ideas and supports the growth of individuals as well as professionals.

title: FAQ: How do I submit my research paper?
description: All papers must be submitted electronically through the Microsoft CMT portal. Please visit our 'Paper Submission' page for detailed guidelines on formatting and to access the submission link. Ensure your paper is anonymized for the double-blind review process.

title: FAQ: What are the registration fees and deadlines?
description: We offer tiered registration fees for students, academics, and industry professionals, with early-bird discounts available until September 15, 2025. You can find the complete fee structure and payment instructions on our 'Registration' page. The final registration deadline is October 25, 2025.

title: FAQ: Will accommodation be provided for attendees?
description: While the conference does not directly provide accommodation, we have partnered with several nearby hotels to offer discounted rates for our attendees. A list of recommended hotels and booking information is available on the 'Venue & Travel' page.

title: FAQ: What is the official language of the conference?
description: The official language for all paper submissions, presentations, and conference proceedings is English. All sessions will be conducted in English.

title: Call for Papers
description: Share Your Vision, Shape the Future of AI

title: Theme: AI/ML (CORE & CROSS-DISCIPLINARY)
description: Topics include: Novel AI/ML Algorithms for SDG Challenges, Explainable AI (XAI) for Sustainability Decisions, Edge AI for Decentralized SDG Solutions...

title: Theme: AUTOMATION
description: Topics include: Robotic Process Automation (RPA) for Sustainable Operations, Autonomous Systems for Environmental Monitoring and Remediation, Smart Grid Automation for Renewable Energy Integration...

title: Theme: BUILDING STRUCTURES AND GEOLOGY
description: Topics include: AI for Sustainable Building Design and Construction, AI-powered Structural Health Monitoring for Resilient Infrastructure, AI in Geo-spatial Data Analysis for Sustainable Urban Planning...

title: Theme: COMMUNICATION SYSTEMS
description: Topics include: AI for Energy-Efficient Communication Networks, IoT and AI for Environmental Sensing and Data Collection, AI-powered Disaster Communication and Early Warning Systems...

title: Theme: ELECTRICAL SYSTEMS
description: Topics include: AI for Power Electronics Optimization, AI-driven Motor Control for Industrial Efficiency, Smart Metering and AI for Residential Energy Management...

title: Theme: MATERIAL SCIENCE
description: Topics include: AI-driven Discovery and Design of Sustainable Materials, AI for Circular Economy in Materials, Predictive Maintenance and Lifecycle Assessment of Materials using AI...

title: Theme: MECHANICAL SYSTEMS
description: Topics include: AI for Energy Efficiency in Mechanical Systems, Predictive Maintenance and Anomaly Detection in Mechanical Systems, Robotics and Automation for Sustainable Manufacturing...

title: Theme: POWER SYSTEMS
description: Topics include: AI-driven Smart Grids for Renewable Energy Integration, Predictive Analytics for Energy Demand Forecasting, AI for Energy Storage Optimization...
